channel.title: Anyone still play Runescape? Oh and Hi
channel.description:
I've cut down on my computer time a lot and the last time I logged into rs was around I dunno Dec 10? But I thought to myself, hmm I wonder how Mopar is doing? So here I am, how is everyone doing? Glad to see Ron Io9 and Jme are here still.
Now that I'm here, does anyone actually still play runescape? I was losing interest and then the whole wilderness fiasco happened so I stopped playing as well as going visiting my favorite old forums too.
Anyway Hey everybody, peace love and sex

item.source: Anyone still play Runescape? Oh and Hi

item.title: Anyone still play Runescape? Oh and Hi
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Cheatest, post:20, topic:193021”]I was playing WC3 and someone was trading a 70 WoW account for a RS account.
Well I went into the room and he was like yeah I have a 70 hunter on Illidan ill trade for a RS 100+ account. I was like sweet (i knew it was a scam but i was bored) so I logged in for the first time since hunter (logged in for a few hours since 2006) so he cant scam my 3k gold. I gave him my password and I was like ok now gimmie your hunter. He was like uh there is a problem ill have to do it later. I checked my mail to see if he changed the password which I knew he was going to but I was planning to do my easter even anyway which I did not even finish lol used my recovery about an hour later got my password back

morel of the story. RS sucks and people are to stupid to realize it they still try to scam accounts and will trade that 3k off.[/quote]
Gotta be careful with this anyways because hackers whom realise they have an account with 1mil on it and can only trade 3k will most probably drop the 1mil in frustration.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone still play Runescape? Oh and Hi
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Cheatest, post:20, topic:193021”]I was playing WC3 and someone was trading a 70 WoW account for a RS account.
Well I went into the room and he was like yeah I have a 70 hunter on Illidan ill trade for a RS 100+ account. I was like sweet (i knew it was a scam but i was bored) so I logged in for the first time since hunter (logged in for a few hours since 2006) so he cant scam my 3k gold. I gave him my password and I was like ok now gimmie your hunter. He was like uh there is a problem ill have to do it later. I checked my mail to see if he changed the password which I knew he was going to but I was planning to do my easter even anyway which I did not even finish lol used my recovery about an hour later got my password back

morel of the story. RS sucks and people are to stupid to realize it they still try to scam accounts and will trade that 3k off.[/quote]

If this was recent, how did you give him your password? Jagex made the password censor addition ages ago.

[quote=“ThugLife, post:15, topic:193021”][quote author=Cruzer link=topic=256854.msg2136252#msg2136252 date=1206515715]
How am I being an asshole when Im voicing my opinion on runescape?
[/quote]
I don’t see anyone asking for that opinion.[/quote]

This post is epic ^

item.title: Anyone still play Runescape? Oh and Hi
item.dc:creator: @Cheatest Cheatest
item.description:
@Cheatest wrote:

I was playing WC3 and someone was trading a 70 WoW account for a RS account.
Well I went into the room and he was like yeah I have a 70 hunter on Illidan ill trade for a RS 100+ account. I was like sweet (i knew it was a scam but i was bored) so I logged in for the first time since hunter (logged in for a few hours since 2006) so he cant scam my 3k gold. I gave him my password and I was like ok now gimmie your hunter. He was like uh there is a problem ill have to do it later. I checked my mail to see if he changed the password which I knew he was going to but I was planning to do my easter even anyway which I did not even finish lol used my recovery about an hour later got my password back

morel of the story. RS sucks and people are to stupid to realize it they still try to scam accounts and will trade that 3k off.

Read full topic

Runescape suck major cock hole.
[/quote]

who the fuck are you? and move to runescape section?

Damnit, do you guys have to be assholes?[/quote]
not really… This is one of the few times.

Anyways me and my friend quit after getting banned several times for no reason. (well a glitch but accounts that didnt do that glitch got banned aswell) We have 1 account now but it sortof sits there. So we are trying to give the money on it to some kid who wants it but doesnt want the account.

So yea.
